## Source: amazon-inspector (2885a4f6fa566cedcd5c365fe4435186a31ed8913af26f8a06bbee3d760e66cb)
The package the-storyverse was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (09e958d1d3f8084930d29c32902be20c176f89fda711767fe04727009d73a341)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'the-storyverse' @ 5.6.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
